attributes.action: Revert recent changes to highway code with regards to cyclists and pedestrians
attributes.additional_details: The new rules haven't been thought through, theres too many variables and questions that lead to confusion. The rules will lead to more accidents potentially fatal, more road rage and create a larger division between road users.
attributes.background: The recent introduction of new rules will/are creating more division between all users of the highway, the rules need to be reverted before serious accidents occur.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607153
